required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on May 29, 2018
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Multiple Ascending Dose (MAD) Combination in Subjects With Multiple Myeloma
clinical_study.official_title: A Phase Ib Multiple Ascending Dose Study of BMS-833923 Alone or in Combination With Lenalidomide (Revlimid) Plus Dexamethasone or in Combination With Bortezomib (Velcade) in Subjects With Relapsed or Refractory Multiple Myeloma

brief_summary.textblock: To evaluate the safety, tolerability, pharmacokinetics, and pharmacodynamics of BMS-833923 administered alone, in combination with lenalidomide plus dexamethasone, or in combination with bortezomib in subjects with relapsed or refractory multiple myeloma.

primary_outcome.measure: To establish DLT(s), MTD, and Phase 2 dose range and schedule of BMS-833923 administered alone, in combination with two dose levels of lenalidomide plus dexamethasone, or with two dose levels of bortezomib in subjects with relapsed or refractory MM
primary_outcome.time_frame: For Treatment Arms A and B, outcome would be measured for approximately 5 months on Days 1, 8, 15, and 28 for Cycles 1 and 2 and then every 28 days for the following cycles

secondary_outcome.measure: To evaluate the safety and tolerability of BMS-833923 as a single agent or in combination with two dose levels of lenalidomide plus a fixed low-dose of dexamethasone or in combination with two dose levels of bortezomib
secondary_outcome.time_frame: For Treatment Arms A and B, outcome would be measured for approximately 5 months on Days 1, 8, 15, and 28 for Cycles 1 and 2 and then every 28 days for the following cycles

secondary_outcome.measure: To evaluate the Pharmacokinetics of BMS-833923
secondary_outcome.time_frame: For Treatment Arms A and B, outcome would be measured for approximately 5 months on Days 1, 8, 15, and 28 for Cycles 1 and 2 and then every 28 days for the following cycles

secondary_outcome.measure: To evaluate the Pharmacodynamics effects of BMS-833923
secondary_outcome.time_frame: For Treatment Arms A and B, outcome would be measured for approximately 5 months on Days 1, 8, 15, and 28 for Cycles 1 and 2 and then every 28 days for the following cycles

arm_group.description: BMS-833923 (Starting dose is a loading dose of 60 mg for 7 days with a 30 mg daily dose thereafter)
BMS-833923 (MTD or below) Lenalidomide (at or below the recommended prescribing dose) Dexamethasone (40 mg)
BMS-833923 (MTD or below) Bortezomib (at or below the recommended prescribing dose)

intervention.description: Capsule, Oral, Once a week, 6 months

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- Confirmed diagnosis of Multiple Myeloma
- Men and Women at least 18 years old
- ECOG status 0-2
- Last therapeutic or diagnostic treatment at least 21 days prior
- Bone marrow transplants must have been completed at least 3 months prior
- Any toxicity from prior therapies must have resolved to Grade â‰¤1
Exclusion Criteria:
- Women pregnant or breastfeeding
- WOCBP unwilling/unable to use acceptable method to avoid pregnancy
- Uncontrolled medical disorder or active infection
- Current or recent (w/in 3 months) gastrointestinal disorder
- Inability to swallow oral medication
- Inability to be venipunctured
- Uncontrolled or significant cardiovascular disease
- Uncontrolled hyperlipidemia
- Intolerance of lenalidomide or bortezomib if participating in Arms B and C
- Concurrent therapy with any other investigational product
- Subjects involuntary incarcerated
- Subjects detained for treatment of psychiatric or physical illness

facility.name: City Of Hope National Medical Center
The Sidney Kimmel Comprehensive Cancer Center

link.description: For FDA Safety Alerts and Recalls refer to the following link: http://www.fda.gov/MEDWATCH/safety.htm
